title: Where are the bug fixes?
text:
This is a really good app, I‚Äôve been using for more than an year and I do recommend it but I just had so many problems during this time; lost playlists, glitches, lost an acc, can‚Äôt add some songs to playlists, no lyrics (I tried many songs and famous ones so literally no explanation) and right now it glitches and I tried logging in and out, reinstalled the app etc‚Ä¶ the thing here is that I have no ‚Äòhelp‚Äô, you won‚Äôt have a ‚Äòreport problem‚Äô in the app, meaning that if there‚Äôs a bug, you gotta search stuff up because they just don‚Äôt help if there‚Äôs a problem‚Ä¶ 
It is a good app, but this has been upsetting me for way too long now and I searched up how to fix the problems and like I said before, it didn‚Äôt work and I can‚Äôt ask the app or report a problem.

title: Good but it needs some work
text: Now, I love this app. I can listen to my music in peace and I have countless songs to choose from. Except for the fact that I can't choose them. If I use my tablet or computer then I can pick what songs I want to listen to but if I'm using my iPhone then I'm stuck with whatever song they give me when I hit shuffle. That includes all the "discover new songs" that they play. I understand giving a few suggestions every now and then but it is ridiculous because if you have less than 10 songs in your playlist, odds are you won't even hear your songs, just music that doesn't relate to your playlist. I get how Premium would allow you to download and remove ads. I wouldn't even mind it if you had to get it to pick a specific track. But at least let me choose to go back a song or just let me play songs in my playlist. Also, they offer a 30 minute ad free thing every now and then but it doesn't work.

title: AdsŸ´ PremiumŸ´ Skips
text: I think this app is extremely convenient for collecting songs to add to your Apple music library in the future or to try and use the lyrics of a song to find a song but unless you want to get premium it's not great for streaming. The ads are constantly breaking up the stream advertising their premium plans sometimes playing the same ads 2-3 times in a row. Also shopifyŸ´ college adsŸ´ and sometimes the ad breaks are longer then the block of music stream between the ads. Now on the free account you only get six skips per hour and if you're anything like me music choice is based on your mood and you want to skip every song you don't want to listen to but the skips are so frustrating in that it says six skips per hour but it seems to take more time than that to get back your skips on the general account.

title: Authenticity
text: Much needed redirection of what authenticity is- there‚Äôs no illusion of perfection- or that relatable is perfect - that‚Äôs always an opportunity to ask & learn more to be better connected- can‚Äôt sell self Love if that makes sense. Vulnerability is beautiful and not for the faint of heart even though at all times completely accessible and a choice available to all. Funs sellable- the journey isn‚Äôt a destination.. meaning even though free and available to all- don‚Äôt sell the stage to embrace the opportunity to join the show but as a collaborative partner only if invited. That‚Äôs not synonymous with a privileged stigma. There‚Äôs a lot of universal authenticity that unfortunately is often overlooked and stereotyped and stigmatized as if not universal despite more specific choices; Let‚Äôs redefine universal based in emotional health & wellness. Thanks for sharing Lovesitos Besitos abrazitos blessingsitos; would love to chatü§üüèªüòòüíØüëç

title: Good App but...
text: I‚Äôve been a long time user and imo, the is the best option in streaming music, especially with premium. I only have two small issues though, I think a re existing feature should be added back to where on an artists page, it shows songs that feature them, but now that isn‚Äôt there and it‚Äôs hard to find songs that feature them. Also when you add songs to que, the very first or very last would be blanked out to the point where you can‚Äôt see the song and and sometimes I would move songs up or down the playing next section and it would sometimes glitch out and sometimes when it does that, it crashes the app and resets everything I did with que and playing next. If I notice a change I will definitely make my review a 5 star.

title: Steadily Worse
text: This app is easy to navigate and good for making your own playlists, but in terms of discovering new music, this app does not know what‚Äôs up, and seems committed to getting worse and worse.  Every time it updates you will experience confusion, frustration, and eventually regret. There is no customizability to their ‚Äúradio‚Äù function, and they are frequently so off the mark with their recommendations that you wonder if you are even logged into your own account. If it weren‚Äôt for the cross fade function they offer, I would have defected back to Pandora a long time ago. Still, I have gotten good use out of this app as long as I am willing to put effort into it like a part time job. Just do your research before choosing which music subscription service you want to shell out your money to; they all have pros and cons.

title: Great
text:
I love this app and almost everything about it. I can only say that one change that would be greatly appreciated is having your artists and genres in a tab to click on. Say, if I want to shuffle all of my pop music, all I would have to do is click the genres tab, find pop and hit shuffle. Or if I wanted to shuffle songs by an artist in my library, then I could hit artists, and shuffle by artist. Right now the only way to do this is to create a playlist, and I don‚Äôt have the time...over all, great app, and highly recommend

Also, another thing I‚Äôd like to add is that I hate the new addition of album thumbnails in playlist view. I liked the sharp, clean look of just the song title. When you have the picture of the album next to the song title, it looks cheap and stupid. Just change back the UI to not show the album covers.

title: This needs to be changed
text: So I've been using the app for a few years now and beforehand you could go into anyone of your daily mix playlists, pick a song, and the playlist would continue in the same order it was laid out. But as of this new update if you pick a song, the next song isn't the one that came after the first song you picked. Instead the next song is randomly picking, almost like the playlist is being shuffled. I know that this might not be a problem to some, but this really bugs me because sometimes in a playlist my favorite songs might be back to back to back. But when I finish listening to one I have to wait for the UI to shuffle through every other song in the playlist before I can listen to my favorites. Please just go back to the way it was before the last update.

title: Can‚Äôt stop using it
text: This app has literally anything you could be looking for in music, on top of making said music sound as good as it possibly can through whatever device you may be using. I‚Äôve sat through countless train rides with this app on and my ear buds in. The app does have ads if you‚Äôre not using premium, but this is to be expected considering every company has to make money somehow. Even though paying for premium may sound like a pain, this method is vastly more cost-efficient than the alternative of paying for every album you want to listen to (apple music.) the app has a very simple and easy to use UI as well as having a system where you can download specific songs to listen to them without using wifi, making it very useful in almost any situation. Overall, the app deserves the ratings which it receives.

title: Good app but needs improvement
text: There is a huge variety of songs and the great thing about getting premium is that you can download the songs and playlists for when you are offline, such as being underground on the train. However there are some small things that can be made for the convenience of the user. For example, providing the lyrics to every song by just tapping on the song‚Äôs album photo. There should also be an option for the user to request song lyrics if it is currently unavailable. Secondly, any song should be made deleted easier from a playlist. At the moment I am able to add any song to a playlist when the song‚Äôs album cover is shown on screen, but there is no option to delete it from this place. Instead i have to scroll through my entire playlist back and forth to find the song i want to remove from my playlist.

title: Slowly becoming worse
text:
I used to enjoy using the app way more than I do now. Previously you could see previous songs that played for you, like Apple Music currently does, so that if you wanted to know what it was you heard but was not around to read the title, It would be no problem to go back and see. Secondly, the podcasting section is getting atrocious. I can‚Äôt keep the shows I actually listen to in my Home Screen without it being crowded with ‚Äònew episodes‚Äô from shows I‚Äôve never gave a listening to. I also can‚Äôt give said shows any kind unapproved/ not interested ratings or reviews, so it‚Äôs kind of forced on you to go and search for what you do keep up with in order to maintain a home page that actually functions how I need. 
I would prefer to be able to listen to my shows in an order I can enjoy versus hand picking each one to add in the queue to avoid random shows from autoplaying‚Ä¶

title: Great app but..
text: This app is great, you have different types of music and artist but if you don‚Äôt have premium it‚Äôs the WORST. for example if you listening to music and you come across an ad you have to listen to a 2 minute ad of some annoying product that most of the time you aren‚Äôt even interested in the ad. Second the skips, you only get not 15 not 13 not even 8 you get SIX ONLY SIX which it so annoying if you don‚Äôt even wanna listen to that music. I know it sounds kinda dumb coming from me but try to find another review that has the same complaint. And last you can‚Äôt even go through the music. For example if you wanna go back in the song you can‚Äôt because it ‚Äúthinks‚Äù you gonna skip throughout the song when you don‚Äôt even care about that is so annoying. (P.S this review is if your gonna download it on mobile idk about the other electronics out there but for a phone it is like this.)

title: what happened?
text: this genuinely used to be my one and only music service for listening to songs i actually liked. now, i can‚Äôt even play playlists without having something ive never even listened to before or something i don‚Äôt remember adding into my playlist being played and it is so infuriating to be forced to listen to pure music that im basically getting FORCED to listen to. i could search up a very specific song and then get a completely different one that was just made by the same artist. it‚Äôs nothing that i want, and i get this probably won‚Äôt be taken into account, but why? what happened? am i just too dumb or is the app just too complex now for no reason? i don‚Äôt remember not being able to play songs i actually wanted to listen to with a pretty okay amount of ads that were regular now and then, here we‚Äôre stuck with music being given to us instead of us looking for it. please fix this, i would honestly rather have more ads

title: This is one of my favorite music service apps to use but there's a bug
text: I love this music service and use it everyday and there's an annoying bug occuring only on my iPad where when I press on the option to change device to play it on and the menu keeps going away automatically I go to click it multiple and it will stay up for about a second or so and automatically go away. I've only noticed this happening on my iPad currently and I've tried everything by unisntalling the app multiple times and reinstalling it and restarting my device a couple of times and updating the app to the most recent software and nothing see to resolve my issue this is so frustrating I stopped trying to controlling my speakers with my iPad as of right now and use my other devices because it won't this is on my other devices please fix this I would be giving you guys 5 stars I'm only giving you like 2 stars because this bug is frustrating to deal with.

title: what did you do to this app?
text: I understand that updates must be done regularly to squash bugs, improve performance and so forth. But with the latest update you ruined my enjoyment of using the app! specifically, I no longer can listen to individual songs off albums that are in my library and I have been a paying premium subscriber for well over a year. I can‚Äôt even read the titles to the traction they give an album instead I get a more options button where are the tracklist and should be. The only option I have for playing the album is to shuffle play. so if my subscription has not been canceled, there‚Äôs no reason that I should not be able to play the music. Somebody had better fix this because I‚Äôm sure I‚Äôm not the only one experiencing this massive issue. if you don‚Äôt fix it by your next update, buy buy subscription.

title: Works OK, could be way better.
text: I download at home and listen all day at work where I have no wi-fi. Player functions work fine, and there are many options for playback quality, download quality, volume compression, and other behavior.. more so than is offered by some other services. Unfortunately playlist management functions are lacking. For instance, you can copy a playlist or station into one of your own playlists, but only if the source list is NOT your own; so if you want to merge one of your lists into another, you must do it one song at a time. Lastly, a significant problem can be downloads. I download at home for listening at work where I have no wi-fi. The problem is that most or all of my songs automatically delete and re-download when I get back on wi-fi and restart the app. Not just the stations ‚Äî which are randomly generated each time ‚Äî but also unchanged personal playlists. This takes needless time and megabytes.

title: Performance Issue
text: it‚Äôs a wonderful app and i‚Äôve been using it for as long as i can remember, and it‚Äôs the most convenient way for me to listen to my music while i do homework, clean, cook, whatever. As of lately however, i can‚Äôt play my music and it‚Äôs more inconvenient than it is helpful. the issue is i will try to play a song, and it will either freeze and won‚Äôt play, or it will play the first 9-12 seconds then stop. i‚Äôm mostly upset because i have all of my music downloaded, but i‚Äôve found the only way to fix this is to exit the app and it will auto-pause, then it will work but it‚Äôs tedious doing this for every single song, some of which won‚Äôt even play. i don‚Äôt know what happened but since about a week and a half ago it‚Äôs been a hassle to listen to music :/

title: Recovering deleted songs
text: There are some minor issues with the app, such as some the variety of music the app contains. Another thing is when you pick a song for the radio it does not play songs related to the song you chose. The biggest thing about the app is the ui. I think the stupidest thing is that you can not recover a song you just mistakenly removed from your songs, and how easily it is to remove a song from just a swipe. Sometimes I accidentally remove song from my library and I have no idea what it is. There should be a way we can recover and find out what song you just recently removed. Or another solution would be giving you a confirmation screen if you really want to remove a song from your library. If you fix this issue, it causes less frustration and annoyed customers, because I would spend 30 mins trying to figure out what song I just removed. Thanks if you can fix this, that would be great!

title: Good but..,
text:
I‚Äôd like to start off with this is AMAZING!!!

I took a star off for each of my major issues though. 
     At first it was great. Very very minimal commercials, and I could play anything I wanted. This was on a chrome book. I do not have premium but I could control where I was in the song and could play any song fully.  Then I downloaded it on my phone. The commercials suddenly tripled, and I couldn‚Äôt control what song I played nor could I skip parts. This was not a huge inconvenience but still irritating. 

      Next I have my huge problem. I made my playlist and it keeps playing songs I have not added. I look through what it has and it has a ‚Äúwe added‚Äù section. I do not like a good majority of these songs and there is no way for them not to play or to skip them without running out of skips. I want to listen to MY music.  This is also such a huge problem because I mainly listen when I am relaxing in a bath or showering. I try to relax in a bath and it plays a song not on my playlist I don‚Äôt like I have to sit up, skip it, and try to get back comfortable. If I am showering o can‚Äôt skip it and Siri doesn‚Äôt listen so I have to listen to it. This really is the main reason I gave 3 stars, as this pesters me SO MUCH. I made a playlist to hear songs I want to hear, not songs that are added without consent that I can not get rid of.

title: Very Upset
text: I used to love this app. I would use it every day. But today I noticed something weird. I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs a bug or something, but I kept clicking on a song, and it would play multiple different songs without even letting me listen to the one I wanted to. I tried skipping them, but then a notification popped up saying I was only aloud to skip six  songs every hour. I was very tempted to give this only one star because there‚Äôs no point on going on an app if you can‚Äôt use it. It may be something I have to fix on my end, and if it is, then I recommend the app. I will happily fix whatever it is and go back to listening to music on here. But until then, I want people to know about this. If it happened to someone else and you found a way to fix it, please tell me how.

title: Quality and database
text: High quality music and a humongous database of music library in all genres. This is the best app I have used so far to play music. If you are not subscribing to premium though I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs worth it because offline music to me is what makes a difference . Offline gives me access when there is no internet ( network and WiFi not available ) this its is perfect when I‚Äôm traveling or in areas with no network. Freedom to create my own playlist plus join the great playlists already out there . So if I have a gathering or going camping or having a toad trip. This applications is able to serve me at all times . All I need to do is access one I created it even if I didn‚Äôt have the time join one of the many created out there. The radio feature is amazing and so it‚Äôs the top hit list to keep you up to date

title: need improvement
text:
the radio and daily mix features are so BAD! I constantly have the same 20 or so songs being suggested to me, no matter the genre, playlist or what it‚Äôs always the same songs. sometimes the recommendations make zero sense but they just put the same songs that I used to love, (and now hate because I‚Äôve heard them way way too many times). I have opened song radios only to find that I know every single one of the 50 songs in that song radio, and I know that none of them fit the same genre as a song that I was originally clicking to make the song radio for. Im beginning to hate all of the songs i listen to and I am STRUGGLING to find new music. FIX YOUR SONG SUGGESTIONS FEATURE.
the mobile app is pretty good but on the desktop app, it‚Äôs so slow and always struggles to connect to my speakers, it doesn‚Äôt crash but it does stop working to the point that i have to force quit it pretty often. also, i really don‚Äôt like that it reshuffles my playlist/queue when i switch the device i‚Äôm using.

title: a great app but has some flaws
text:
i recently switched over to this app a few months ago for no real reason just to have a refreshing new start on a music app. it is an amazing app! but i have to issues with it. 

1. the crashing. the apps seems to crash quite often. i‚Äôll be listening to a song and then bam the app crushes and i have to go back to the app and play the song again but it‚Äôll restart it which is very VERY annoying. and that doesn‚Äôt even fix the problem. it‚Äôll happen over and over again (even closing out the app doesn‚Äôt help). it‚Äôs so so annoying and irritating because i just want to listen to my music smoothly and even a simple music app can‚Äôt do that. 

2. the shuffle. a good chunk of my playlists are fairly short (about 15-30 songs) i play them all on shuffle and because my playlists are short they end fairly quick. but whenever i go back to shuffle and play my playlist again it won‚Äôt change the shuffle list. it‚Äôll play the songs in the same order again. which... defeats the whole purpose of shuffle and is quick upsetting when you want to listen to a completely new order of your songs. 

but overall this app is very very good! just those two cons make me rate it 4 stars because they are quick annoying and shouldn‚Äôt even be a problem with an amazing app like this!

title: Ads ads ads ads (music) ads ads ads ads
text: I'm not gonna pay premium for yet another thing, so I get it, ads are my "payment" to choose using this app for free. And before it was fine. Ad plays, listen to music for AWHILE, ad plays again. Now, even when it says, "enjoy the next 30 minutes of ad free music" after listening/watching a particularly long ad, it'll only play one or two songs MAYBE before another ad is played. And sometimes it stops playback in the middle of a series of ads, so when you go to "continue," it plays the ads AGAIN before going back to the music. I might as well listen to terrestrial radio if I'm gonna be listening to this many ads. Not that anything will come of this review right? I'm not paying for the app so screw my opinion/experience.

title: Just one thought.
text:
My last review was a complaint about how you guys repeat the same ads over and over, and you fixed it. Mostly. Thank you; that was considerate. 

What I would like to bring to your attention this time is that when you make promises, you have to keep them. This issue is beginning to happen with the ‚Äúwatch this video to get thirty minutes of add-free music!...(yes, really!)‚Äù 

So I click on the add, watch the add, sometimes even enjoy the add...and then six minutes later I‚Äôm getting the same thing. I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs a glitch or not, but it may become a problem if it is happening with more than just me. If you tell people that they can get thirty add-free minutes of music if they do something, and then they DO that stuff, and you don‚Äôt give them the 30 minutes...it‚Äôs like shorting someone on a payment. Nobody likes that.

title: Shockingly bad app
text:
I love this service and have used this app for years, but this app runs so badly that I am starting to consider swapping to Apple Music. The download music function is a joke. Music that I have had downloaded for months will randomly not be available whenever I leave service. Entire playlists will decide they need to re-download on a whim. It is impossible to access downloaded albums without service, it will just attempt to load indefinitely. The only way to actually have radios download is to open the app and go to the radio everyday after they update (sometimes they never update at all!). Another great feature is how the app will randomly close itself mid-song, this is awesome whenever you‚Äôre in the middle of an activity and have to stop to reopen the app. The crashing has been much worse than ever for the last 2 updates. 
I‚Äôve been putting up with the quirks of this app for years but now I‚Äôm wondering why I‚Äôm paying $10 a month for an app that I constantly have issues with.

title: Only a couple problems
text:
Like the app. It‚Äôs pretty straightforward and makes it easier to find new music. I‚Äôve had problems with it glitching or something lately though. When I tried to play my liked songs it started playing random music. I checked and it was because none of my liked songs were there anymore. The songs were still liked when I looked them up but I had to relike them to put them back in the liked album. Problem is, I don‚Äôt know the names of most of the songs I had in there. Kind of inconvenient. 
The second problem is that whenever I watch the ad for 30 minutes of free listening, it never gives me more than 4-6 songs before it starts playing a series of ads. It‚Äôs a little bit annoying so I hope it‚Äôs fixed soon.

title: Progressively worse
text:
About a year ago there was an update that made it so to search your library for a specific artist you had to be following them like this is discount Twitter. Annoying but fine, I‚Äôll just follow my artists and then I can still search my library for a specific one and play them when I want. Now that‚Äôs not even possible. Searching YOUR LIBRARY for an artists will show you that artists ENTIRE catalog, regardless of how many of those songs you‚Äôve actually saved. Why even have an artists tab in your library if that tab takes you to music that isn‚Äôt in your library? The artists tab takes you to the same place that a regular search takes you. If the goal was to ‚Äústreamline‚Äù the app then you just made two routes to the same destination, while removing a vital feature.
Now, if you turn off data and click on the artist you‚Äôre given a ‚Äúdownloaded songs‚Äù option. Was it really too difficult to give this option when data is turned on as well? Why do I have to cripple my phone to make the app usable?

title: Only problem
text: I really love this app, tons of music and podcasts. I love the download capability for days when I‚Äôm going to be away from signal or just want to save data. However I do have one problem with it and it‚Äôs kind of a big problem for me. Whenever I stream over data podcasts don‚Äôt always save my spots or they‚Äôll stop all together and jump to the next episode which is super inconvenient because lots of times I‚Äôm working where I can‚Äôt just go back to the last episode. When these two combine I‚Äôm stuck either relistening to majority of the podcast or even all the way from the beginning! Especially since I can‚Äôt just fast forward for some reason I‚Äôd have to sit there and listen to the entire thing in 15s blips or at x3 speed. I really hope they fix this soon as lots of my friends complained about it as well

title: I‚Äôm angry!! ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨

title: Can‚Äôt restart playlist
text: So, the app is great, yeah. Good music, doesn‚Äôt drain my battery like some other music apps. However, the user interface is pretty bad, meaning you can‚Äôt restart your playlist. Once it‚Äôs done with your songs, it plays some recommended songs, aka songs that aren‚Äôt in my playlist, aka songs I don‚Äôt want to listen to. I know some people appreciate this feature, but not me. I only want to listen to the songs in my playlist and nothing but, however there is no way I can restart my playlist. I‚Äôve googled it and everything to no avail. I‚Äôve seen people say ‚Äúthere is no easy way to restart your playlist‚Äù but I can‚Äôt find any way whatsoever. Please, just please change this so I don‚Äôt have to use some other bad app that crashes every three songs. Also, what‚Äôs the point of shuffling when it plays your songs in the same order anyway? Yeah, it plays it in a random order, but it‚Äôs that same random order every time. Mix it up! Overall, good as an app, good idea, bad execution.

title: Terrible Update
text:
Remember how easy it was like to like and unlike songs by pressing the heart button once? Well now you have to press a plus button and press a couple more buttons to add it to your ‚Äúliked playlist‚Äù. Then you have to do that all over again just to remove it from your ‚Äúliked playlist‚Äù. Remember how easy it was to find what songs you liked because they had a heart next to them? Well now that‚Äôs gone with this new update. You have to play every song individually to see which ones you liked which is not convenient when listening to playlists.

Also they added features that make it look like tiktok. As a premium member I‚Äôm not paying for a second version of tiktok I‚Äôm paying for the music app I‚Äôve known and loved for the past several years. 

Bring back the well known user friendly perfect music app please. I‚Äôm convinced the people whose job it is to test new UI layouts really hate convenience and efficiency.

title: Stop changing the UI so much
text:
Edit: they fixed my issue by changing the behavior of the checkmark button, but these UI changes have just been nonstop lately. I‚Äôm fine with an improved experience, IF it improves the experience. 

This new method of ‚Äúliking songs‚Äù is awful. 1) you can‚Äôt see what songs you have saved to your liked songs in a playlist anymore 2) adding songs to your liked playlist takes longer now (additional menu) 3) in car view, saving a song is now more dangerous because of the additional menu It really is not that hard to just make a ‚Äúheart‚Äù button and a ‚Äúplaylist‚Äù button on the same screen. These buttons serve different purposes. Bring back the old method, this new one is garbage and I really hoped the developers would‚Äôve realized it sucked when they were beta testing it.

title: My reason to keep going on.
text: This app has been here sitting on my phone for some years now. It has helped me through many steps in my life wether it be marriage, divorce, work, unemployment, etc. and if it weren‚Äôt for this app then I don‚Äôt know how I would make it through it. It has helped introduce me to a plethora of different artists that I have come to love and see grow in their careers. It has been so easy and compatible to use and rely on when you have your turn to play music with friends or even for yourself. The option to have music offline is also a blessing as it has given me the ability to keep my music even when I am for example camping or far away in the sticks. Overall this app is a phenomenal treasure and I wish I could give it a better score than 5 stars!!

title: Plz fix the adds on JRE
text: This is my favorite app for music/ podcasts.  I‚Äôm fine listening to ads (even though I shouldn‚Äôt because I‚Äôm paying for a premium membership) but unfortunately once the ads start on the JRE podcast they literally don‚Äôt stop. I‚Äôve tested this out and At some point I‚Äôll just give up.  I‚Äôll just shut the app down and go back to the podcast to find my place and just skip over the ad break.  However it‚Äôs very frustrating to do this while driving or exercising. I‚Äôm not sure if other people are having this problem with this specific podcast but it‚Äôs really irritating to deal with when you‚Äôre driving and all of a sudden your podcast is now playing like 10 minutes of ads‚Ä¶. It will NOT go back to the podcast after the ad breaks. Thanks  üòé

title: Mostly Good
text: Everything about the app is amazing, I am listing to it right now actually. My playlist has over 100 songs on it, and I can find most of the songs I want to add to it. There are also clean versions of most songs that have foul language. Also, they have added lyrics now that moves with the song, which is amazing as well! But the is one thing that is sooo annoying There are SO MUCH adds. And like I said it‚Äôs really annoying. Example, right now I have been listing to music for about 30 minutes straight, and there has been AT LEAST 13 adds. Probably over. I‚Äôm not joking. There isn‚Äôt even an option to skip it! (I think. If I‚Äôm wrong very sorry) So that is one suggestion I have for the app, is that there is a skip option on the adds. Then it wouldn‚Äôt be as bad. Otherwise, the app is great, I love it! Thanks for your time! üòÅ

title: The only app I‚Äôve been using for music since 2015
text: Has every song I‚Äôve ever wanted to listen to. The ‚Äúradio‚Äù feature is great for discovering new music. Things that could be better - it seems that the ‚Äúradio‚Äù feature tends to favor artists‚Äô hits and there‚Äôs less popular songs from an artist won‚Äôt come up unless you go to the artist page and listen to all songs from the artist. Also I don‚Äôt like using shuffle in listening to my library of liked songs bc it will overly favor some songs and rarely ever play others. I‚Äôve had to unlike some songs just so that they would stop coming up so often when using shuffle. I have 1405 songs on my list. I‚Äôll instead just scroll to a random song on the liked songs list and play them in sequential order to get more diversity of songs (vs hearing the same ones too often).

title: Not bad but not good
text: The quality on my music is real good with my headphones my music sounds even better but what makes this app from keeping it from being perfect is the inclusion of limited skips witch makes this app makes me run out of skips before I get to the song I wanna get what I recommend for this app is to just let us listen to the song we want to listen to with out making us lose all our skips. Plus the inclusion of a premium hurt this app a bit the premium gives you unlimited skips and the ability to download songs but what I don‚Äôt understand is why I can not Download music from the beginning. Overall this music app is. It perfect but not bad if you want quality  music this is the app but warned you we‚Äôll have to skip a lot to get the song you want.

title: Almost perfect
text:
Spotify‚Äôs almost perfect, but I feel like the fact that there are so many things that are added in the premium that you‚Äôre missing in the free version is kind of crazy. (Though it does make people want to buy it more so credit to them on that.) Also, I think the algorithm that shows songs that are similar to each other could be improved, because I end up seeing songs that I‚Äôve already heard or know, and I think it would be better if it showed songs that are similar, but that I have not heard. (So that there‚Äôs not so many repeats, especially in the daily mixes. Usually it‚Äôs things I‚Äôve already liked or listened to multiple times. Which can be good or bad.)

Overall, it‚Äôs a great app I just think there could be some improvements.

title: smart shuffle is crap
text: the worst possible decision you could have ever made was ro force us to listen to your suggestions ever since adding smart shuffle my app has been so buggy to the point where i have had mental breakdowns and broke my phone because MOST PEOPLE USE MUSIC TO CALM DOWN. but now i cant use the shuffle button to refresh my playlist when you guys only play the popular music even though it says shuffle or else the app will bug and crash. i cant create a playlist in the queue to listen to because when it starts or if i press shuffle it will just skip the song im listening to and it is infuriating. its starting to look more worth the work of switching my thousands of liked songs to a new app then dealing with the amount of bugs smart shuffling brought please put in an option to completely turn it off AND I DO NOT MEAN ON THE CURRENT SHUFFLE BUTTON. THAT IS NOT ACCEPTABLE ON ACCOUNT OF WAITING FOR IT TO LOAD AND IT CRASHES MY APP. you already had weekly discover this was so unnecessary and im about to stop my subscription

title: Not the best
text: Well first of all, when I‚Äôm in a playlist or album it won‚Äôt let me see what songs are in there. In my IPad on the other hand; it lets me play any song and lets me skip as many times as I want (and I don‚Äôt have premium). On my phone it‚Äôs the complete opposite. That‚Äôs really annoying. I don‚Äôt get why being able to play any song in a playlist or album is a premium feature. If I‚Äôm trying to choose a certain song from a playlist or album; I can‚Äôt because it won‚Äôt let me see the songs. If it does (which is rare), it only lets me see a preview of the song or piece. I feel like some of the non-premium features are just unfair. It‚Äôs hard when you‚Äôre trying to listen to a piece you like but you can‚Äôt because without premium you can‚Äôt choose certain songs. Although, the app does have some good quality. It‚Äôs not that bad but it needs some improvement.

title: Awful!!!!!! Don‚Äôt waste your money!!!
text: After multiple days of trying to fix my account. Music just starts playing across all my devices in the middle of the night or if I‚Äôm listening to music it will just stop or start another song from a random playlist I have never heard of before mid song! It‚Äôs starting to get annoying when I have deleted the app, re-downloaded it, changed my password,  restarted my device, looked up solutions on line and people just wrote that it has happened to them and no solution has helped. After about 5 days now, I‚Äôve had enough of the random music playing in the middle of the night across different devices in my home and the constant stopping of actual music I want to hear. I‚Äôm stopping my payments and going elsewhere for my music! Don‚Äôt waste your money!

title: Encouraging bait
text:
The music selection is good and there are some concepts that are good but there are some major issues with it that I cannot respect.

The immense amount of ads that play one after another are absolutely baffling, just now I got 5 straight, 30 second, unskippable ads. This alongside things like not being able to directly chose what song you want to listen to, instead having to shuffle a playlist; or the 6 skips per hour rule, really only have one purpose. There is no rational reason why these limitations would be put in place other than to siphon money out of its users that want to listen to their favorite artists. It‚Äôs scummy and it‚Äôs not even trying to hide it, they are essentially saying, ‚ÄúYeah you can try and bare with these restrictions we set in place, OR you could pay us money to get rid of the issues we made.‚Äù

title: Could have some improvements
text: I‚Äôve been using this app for a few years and I loved it until recently. I hate making a playlist and not even hearing any of the music on it. I, personally, love musicals and try to listen to my favorites but I can‚Äôt. I don‚Äôt want to hear music from rappers when I‚Äôm listening to the music I was hoping I could hear. Also, I don‚Äôt appreciate getting false advertisement. I can‚Äôt be told to listen to an ad and get 30 minutes of ad-free music but have to sit through 5 ads, listen to three songs and get another 4 ads. I would really love to see a listen history. I don‚Äôt have premium and I usually leave my music playing off my speaker and phone when I leave the room so if I come back at the end of the song, and I like it, I want to be able to come back and find the song.

title: Could be better
text: With the ads, it‚Äôll give you the option to watch an ad for 30 mins of ad free music, lies. It makes me watch 7 videos then plays 2 songs and then right back to ads. If you would stick to what you advertise and give us an actual 30 mins of ad free music, your product would be worthwhile. And why are the ads a lot louder than the music? I listen to music when I‚Äôm working and play it over a loud speaker, I turn my speaker all the way up to hear it. When the ads come on I have to turn it down cause it‚Äôs way too loud then have to turn it back up when the music comes on. Kind of a waste of my time If you ask me. And sometimes when a song plays, about halfway through it skips itself and plays another song. Or when I‚Äôm listening to one artist, it plays another that has nothing to do with what I was listening to. I listen to country and heavy metal. (I hate a lot of rap) when I was listening to Lee Brice, it started playing that XXXtencacion dude. Why? I don‚Äôt listen to him nor will I ever. I don‚Äôt like rap, and especially hate Cardi B.

title: Wow! You can play ANY of your favorite songs!
text: I have one concern about this app though, why do you have to pay? I mean I got unlimited but I can afford it, uh, I don‚Äôt know if other people can so that was for the people out there üòÉ. I love country music and some pop but most pop songs now are, for example, Kiki. Or, anything by Drake, XXX, or Tydollasign or The weekend are NAUGHTY. I know some people may not agree with me like this, but you should put a thing where you can see the peoples playlist, and give the people who dont like XXX, Or drake, or anything else, a mute button to mute out the bad songs. I‚Äôm ok with like 5 swear words in a song, but really bad songs mute out. Songs with rap in them are fine but ones with bad bad words and songs that rap through the hole song, actually, TALK through the whole song SHOULD BE MUTED. I only know these artists because someone in my family listens to it, but now they dont. Ok hope you do this bye thanks for the great app!

title: Best Consumer Mindset
text: I had asked for a few things (I'm sure others had too), such as a liked playlist being viewable to others and the ability to turn playlists viewable to others on and off. This company DELIVERS. I listen to music literally all day and this app never ceases to impress me. You can now modify what playlists affect your taste in music! The app creates playlists for you and recommends things you can like (if you are into the random pandora or station style) or if you like to know exactly what you will be listening to, you can pick out playlists and songs you specifically want. I have been using premium for a few years now and it is literally a necessity. I would want to be without it. For such a low cost and the features that you get, it‚Äôs a no-brainer.
